greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominator of the harmonic mean of the first n composite numbers.
comment: Also numerator of the sum of the reciprocals of the first n composite numbers (A250133/A296358).
link: Colin Barker, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..500
example: a(3) = 13 because the first 3 composite numbers are [4,6,8] and 3 / (1/4+1/6+1/8) = 72/13.
program: composite(n) = for(k=0, primepi(n), isprime(n++)&&k--); n \\ from A002808
s=vector(100); for(k=1, #s, s[k]=denominator(harmonicmean(vector(k, i, composite(i))))); s
xref: The following fractions are all related to each other: Sum 1/n: A001008/A002805, Sum 1/prime(n): A024451/A002110 and A106830/A034386, Sum 1/nonprime(n): A282511/A282512, Sum 1/composite(n): A250133/A296358.
results.author: _Colin Barker_, Nov 14 2014
